attributes.action: Change of law to allow citizens to trigger an election or public confidence vote
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to be held accountable for their manifesto lies. They have lost the trust of the public. They do not speak for the majority of the country anymore. Their lies to gain a majority vote, about "financial black holes", about the state of the economy to raise needless taxes, their inability to control illegal migration are all tantamount to their demise. Now Labour have shown their true policies, a General Election should be held to allow the public to vote with true clarity.
attributes.background: The Labour party has broken manifesto pledges and has deceived the general public to gain power. There is a feeling of distain and lack of trust in the current governing party. They have lost the trust of the country and are causing harm to the economy and should be held accountable for their lies.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311
